info.title: eShop - Catalog HTTP API
info.description: The Catalog Microservice HTTP API. This is a Data-Driven/CRUD microservice sample

get.description: Get a paginated list of menu items

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Filter by category

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version, in the format 'major.minor'.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version, in the format 'major.minor'.

parameters.description: List of ids for menu items to return

parameters.description: The API version, in the format 'major.minor'.

parameters.description: The id of the menu item to delete
